title: The Best Selling Padron Cigar & Mr. Garofalo Goes to Concord
itunes:title: The Best Selling Padron Cigar & Mr. Garofalo Goes to Concord
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority we dig into The Cigar Authority Care Package and light up the #1 selling Padron cigar on the market. It’s a Nicaraguan puro but we’ll tell you more during the show.

Mr. Garofalo goes to the state capitol here in New Hampshire and we will have a recap his trip and the battles New Hampshire retailers are engaged in.

In the second of the show we light up The Oscar Habano and tell you how we first came across this wonderful cigar as well as announce the Two Guys Smoke Shop 32nd Anniversary party.
